scripts.start:dev: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:dev && react-scripts start
scripts.start:dev:greg: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:dev:greg && HTTPS=true HOST=ui-dev-greg.cosmo-test.com react-scripts start
scripts.start:dev:jo: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:dev:jo && HTTPS=true HOST=ui-dev-jo.cosmo-test.com react-scripts start
scripts.start:dev:sherwin: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:dev:sherwin && HTTPS=true HOST=ui-dev-sherwin.cosmo-test.com react-scripts start
scripts.start:dev:yapa: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:yapa && HTTPS=true HOST=ui-yapa.cosmo-test.com react-scripts start
scripts.start:greg: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:greg && react-scripts start
scripts.semantic:build: (cd semantic && gulp build-css build-assets) && (mkdir -p src/semantic/themes/ && cp semantic/dist/semantic.min.css src/semantic && cp -r semantic/dist/themes/default src/semantic/themes/)
scripts.build:dev: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:dev && react-scripts build
scripts.build:yapa: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:yapa && react-scripts build
scripts.build:greg: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:greg && react-scripts build
scripts.build:test: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:test && react-scripts build
scripts.build:prod: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:prod && react-scripts build
scripts.build:staging: yarn run prepare && yarn run config:staging && react-scripts build
scripts.test: yarn run prepare:test && CI=true react-scripts test --env=jsdom --testPathIgnorePatterns=__tests__
scripts.test:cover: yarn run prepare:test && yarn run test --coverage
scripts.test:cover:text: yarn run prepare:test && yarn run test --coverage --coverageReporters=text-summary
